sentence.Network_en: Lumpen shapes began to appear out of the shadows.
sentence.Network_cn: 阴影里闪出几个大大的黑影。

sentence.Network_en: The forest was dark and silent, haunted by shadows and unseen presences.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个森林黑暗寂静，经常有幽灵和看不见的鬼怪出没。

sentence.Network_en: He was lolling on the sofa in the shadows near the fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他懒洋洋地躺在炉火边一个背光的沙发上。

encyclopedia.content: Westlife(西城男孩)2009年专辑《Where We Are》中的一首单曲

entry.def: A shadow is a dark shape on a surface that is made when something stands between a light and the surface.

example.ex: An oak tree cast its shadow over a tiny round pool...
example.tran: 一棵橡树的影子投射在一洼圆形的小水池上。

example.ex: Nothing would grow in the shadow of the grey wall...
example.tran: 灰墙的背阴处什么东西也长不出来。

entry.def: Shadow is darkness in a place caused by something preventing light from reaching it.

example.ex: Most of the lake was in shadow.
example.tran: 湖面的大部分都处在背阴中。

entry.def: If something shadows a thing or place, it covers it with a shadow.
If someone shadows you, they follow you very closely wherever you go.

example.ex: The supporters are being shadowed by a large and highly visible body of police.
example.tran: 拥护者们被大队警察明目张胆地跟踪。

entry.def: A British Member of Parliament who is a member of the shadow cabinet or who is a shadow cabinet minister belongs to the main opposition party and takes a special interest in matters which are the responsibility of a particular government minister.
If you say that something is true without a shadow of a doubt or without a shadow of doubt, you are emphasizing that there is no doubt at all that it is true.

example.ex: It was without a shadow of a doubt the best we've played.
example.tran: 毫无疑问这是我们表现最出彩的一次。

entry.tran: 在…的阴影之下;在…的光环下（显得逊色)
entry.def: If you live in the shadow of someone or in their shadow, their achievements and abilities are so great that you are not noticed or valued.

example.ex: He has always lived in the shadow of his brother.
example.tran: 他一直活在他哥哥的影子中。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a shadow of their former self, you mean that they are much less strong or capable than they used to be.

example.ex: Johnson returned to the track after his ban but was a shadow of his former self.
example.tran: 约翰逊在禁赛结束后又回到了跑道上，但已找不回当初的状态。

auth_sentence.content: Keeping to the protective shadows, Mari followed him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Keeping to the protective shadows, Mari followed him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Keeping to the protective shadows, Mari followed him.
